name: Space Rockets: Spaceship Rocket Simulator
summary:
Isn’t it everyone’s dream to dive into space? Get ready for the ignition and have fun exploring the universe in this spacial adventure with fun and challenging missions!
Brave the unusual terrains of Artiska, Platunia, Vulkar and Wentura in your daring journey and try to land with perfection on the most uninviting places.
Solve the levels in multiple ways with your own strategy, but watch out for obstacles and be careful not to run out of fuel.
Collect the bonus star of every level to get even more points. Attaboy!
